#summary The dt element represents a term in a definition list.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *dt element*

== Usage ==

Within a [DlElement definition list], `dt` represents a term to be defined.

Within a [DialogElement dialog], `dt` represents a speaker in a conversation.

== Attributes ==

  * [DtAlignAttribute align]
  * [DtClearAttribute clear]
  * [DtHeightAttribute height]
  * [DtNowrapAttribute nowrap]
  * [DtWidthAttribute width]
  * [CommonAttributes common attributes]
